description.p: This event allows you to dynamically set the inline style property for summary values. For example, you can display a 'total' in red if it is above a certain value or in green if it is below a certain value.

page.discussion: This event fires if a Grid has summary fields. It is fired before the Summary Section row in rendered.

section.description: The following variables are available to you in the event:

item.name: e.rtc
item.description: Used to store run time calculations that can be used by other server-side events. You can put any data in this variable that you want to pass to other events. e.g. *[xb:e.rtc.mydata = 'value1']*

item.name: e.summaryValues
item.description: Summary values for the fields for which summary calculations were defined.

item.name: e.summaryStyle
item.description: Inline style for each summary value, as defined in the Grid properties. The purpose of this event is to modify the inline style for any of the summary fields.

section.title: Examples
section.description: Example summary values in e (assuming you requested summary calculations for the QUANTITY field):
section.example: e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Count e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Min e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Max e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.First e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Last e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Total e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Average e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Var e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.StdDev

section.description: This example code sets the in-line style for the 'Total' value for the 'Quantity' field:
section.example: if e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Total < 10 then e.summaryStyle.QUANTITY.Total = a5_CSS_Combine(e.summaryStyle.QUANTITY.Total,"color: red;") else if e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Total >= 10 .and. e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Total < 20 then e.summaryStyle.QUANTITY.Total = a5_CSS_Combine(e.summaryStyle.QUANTITY.Total,"color: blue;") else e.summaryStyle.QUANTITY.Total = a5_CSS_Combine(e.summaryStyle.QUANTITY.Total,"color: green") end if
section.note: The [a5_CSS_Combine()] function combines to in-line style definitions. For example, if the in-line style was set in the builder to "text-align: right;" and you add in "color:red;" the combined style is: "text-align:right; color:red;"

description.p: You can also set state variables in this event. The value of any state variables will be available in all subsequent ajax callbacks (in the e.__si2 object).
